name: narrow are the vessels
description:
this unfinished story i was writing, titled Narrow Are the Vessels, has been haunting  me for years. i think this is a way to let it go. i hope it's a good concession on my promise to not write about you anymore.

this zine is not mobile-friendly. please read this on computer if at all possible. you need a cursor to get the full experience.

made in twine for the shufPoetry Experimental Poetry Jam
